name: sfpwowerscript-deploydestructivemanifest-task
friendlyName: Deploy Destructive Manifest To the provided org
description: Deploy destructive manifest to an authenticated org, This task is part of SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: An empty package.xml will be automatically created, Read more about the task at  https://sfpowerscripts.com/tasks/deployment-tasks/deploy-destructive-maifest-to-an-org/
author: azlam.abdulsalam

inputs.name: target_org
inputs.label: Alias or username of the target org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alias or username of the target org where the code should be deployed

inputs.name: method
inputs.label: Destructive Manifest Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: If text is specified, add the members in the next field, if URL, pass in the location of the destructiveChanges.xml such as the raw git url

inputs.name: destructive_manifest_text
inputs.label: Enter the destructive manifest
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type in the destructive manifest, follow the instructions, https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.daas.meta/daas/daas_destructive_changes.htm

inputs.name: destructive_manifest_filepath
inputs.label: The path to the destructive manifest xml
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to the xml file which contains the destructive changes

inputs.name: isTelemetryEnabled
inputs.label: Send Anonymous Usage Telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this will help us to collect information on the tasks and improve services. All information collected is anonymised, please check code repository to understand what data is collected
